casebody.data:
MORTON COAL COMPANY, Inc., Owner of THE Barges RUTHIE M. and THE FLORENCE M., Appellee, v. THE Steam Tug S. L. CROSBY, Cornell Steamboat Company, Appellant. The Barge CITY, McLain Line, Inc., Appellee, Cornell Steamboat Company, Edward Coykendall, and American Surety Company of New York, Appellants. No. 254. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Feb. 13, 1934. Kirlin, Campbell, Hiekox, Keating & Me-Grann, of New York City (Robert S. Erskine and Henry P Elliott both of New York City, of counsel), for The S. L. Crosby. Purdy & Purdy, of New York City (John E. Purdy, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee..

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree (4 F. Supp. 317) affirmed.
